Package com.syncron.ps.tools.fileMonitoring

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileSender
    An interface for transferring files to a remote location.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileMonitor
    This class listens for new files in given directories.
    FileMonStarter
    This class initializes the logger, sender and monitored directories based on the property file passed as an argument to the method main.
    FTPFileSender
    An implementation of FileSender that uses FTP to transfer local files to a remote location.
    MonitoredDirectory
    Stores information about transferring files from a local directory to a remote one.
    SFTPFileSender
    An implementation of FileSender that uses SFTP to transfer local files to a remote location.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConnectionDetailsException
    An exception thrown in case connection details cannot be read from the property file.
    TransferFailedException
    An exception thrown when file transfer failed.
